landing.headingText: One space for all your learning.
landing.subheadingText: Learn from anywhere, anytime. Instant access to all courses and activities.

dashboard.cardSliderSubtitle: Use your dashboard to pin your textbooks and create playlists to share with your class.
dashboard.noBooks_subTitle: Any books you save while browsing the catalog will be added here for you to view later.
dashboard.noPlaylists_subTitle: Any playlists you create will be added here for you to view, share, and use in your classes.

actionCard.actionCardSubtitles: Save your class books to your dashboard to quickly access your book materials.
Any playlists you create will be added here for you to view, share, and use in your classes.

createClassPage.pageSubTitle: Add your class details and start inviting students, creating assignments, and viewing progress.
createClassPage.classSubHeader: Name your class and assign the start and end dates.
createClassPage.selectBook_txt: Assign a book to your class in order to view and assign materials.
createClassPage.titleErrorMsg: Name should be less than 50 characters.
createClassPage.endDateErrorMsg: End Date cannot be less than today's date

successClassPage.successCaption_txt: Your class has been added! Share the class key below to let your students join

myClassPage.classSubHeading: Your current, upcoming and past classes
myClassPage.pageTitleNoClassArchived: See your list of archived classes here
myClassPage.pageSubTitleNoClassArchived: Any class you have archived will appear here. Once archived, you can still view class details. You may restore the class to allow students to rejoin.

myClassPage.noClassSubtitle: Add your classes to invite students and get to all of your class materials.

classDrawerPane.classDrawerSubTitle: Create another class using this textbook material for your students.

bookViewTOC.activity_byline: Select an item to view materials.

welcomePage.message: Let's get started. Select the role that best describes you.

courseKeyPage.subHeading: Use the class code provided by your teacher or skip for now.
courseKeyPage.helper_txt: Your class code should look like: iqig-Gq32. Be sure to check your email to see if your teacher sent you an invite.
courseKeyPage.alreadyEnrolledMsg: You are already enrolled in this course
courseKeyPage.clickToExitMsg: Please enter a different course key or click here to exit.

schoolKeyPage.message: Use the school key provided by your school or skip for now.
schoolKeyPage.helper_txt: Your school key should look like: ABC-DEF-GHI. Please contact your school admin if you don’t have school key.

dashboard.pageDescription: Select your books to add to your My Books list. Once added, you'll be able to view all book materials directly from the dashboard.

browse.pageDescription: Find all our digital books and their associated resources.

snackBarMessages.addToMyBooks: 1 book has been added to My Books.
snackBarMessages.removeFromMyBooks: 1 book has been removed from My Books.

classes.pageSubTitle: Select books from either your list (My Books) or the full catalog (All Books) to associate materials with your class.

settings.pageSubTitle: Update and change details about your account

Password.newPasswordRules_text: Must have a min of 8 characters and contain: 1 uppercase, 1 lowercase, 1 number, and 1 special character.

Accessibility.samplePara_text: Check it out! Here's an example body paragraph. Toggle the font size to make this text larger or smaller. Saving these changes will update the text across the entire app.

ErrorMessages.newPasswordError_text: Must have a min of 8 characters and contain: 1 uppercase, 1 lowercase, 1 number, and 1 special character.
ErrorMessages.confirmPasswordError_text: New password and Confirm password must match

snackBarMessages.incorrectPassword: Incorrect current password. Please try again
